Uses of Class
project.MyValidationException

    • Uses of MyValidationException in project

      Methods in project that throw MyValidationException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Order.calHandlingCharge()
      Calculates then sets the handling charge of the order.
      void ProcessOrder.createOrder()
      Using information stored in orderInfo, creates a new order object and populates it.
      double Order.getHandlingCharge()
      Calls calHandlingCharge before returning handlingCharge.
      double Order.getTotal()
      Calculates total by adding extendedPrice to handlingCharge.
      void ProcessOrder.loadProperties(java.lang.String propertyFilePath)
      Loads each property file at given path into system properties.
      void DOMWriter.populateFromMemory()
      Creates DOM representation of order objects inside orders instance.
      void ProcessOrder.readCharges()
      Reads handling charges from given input file, setting order instance variables hChargeQuantity and hChargeAmount.
      void ProcessOrder.run()
      Start of program, determines running conditions from properties and runs appropriate methods for reading orders in then writing orders out.
      void ProcessOrder.validateProcessingProperties()
      Ensures the values determining processing type in properties file is valid.
      void ProcessOrder.writeConcurrent()
      Creates new Thread for each Order and initiates writing to output file.
      void ProcessOrder.xmlWriteOrder()
      Runs load method on DOMWriter with current orders object, which outputs an XML document representing all orders in memory.

      Constructor with Order object parameter.

      Constructor.

      Constructor that loads the passed property file.
